data.name: TheWaveVR
data.detailed_description:
ANNOUNCING WAVE WEDNESDAYS!!!!

Tune in every Wednesday at 7pm PST for a new show!!!

TheWaveVR is the interstellar music festival of the future you can access at any time from anywhere. Attend next level live concerts, discover mind-bending audio-visual experiences, and rave out with your friends at private dance parties. Make new friends from across the planet as you explore TheWaveVR universe.

Note: This experience is designed for the HTC Vive.


"As all of my VR experiences so far, exhilarating, great, thought and idea provoking and left me wanting for more!"
-Darude

"TheWave is the first VR experience that captures the excitement of a live performance in a totally original way. While many people are chasing an emulation of a nightclub, The Wave is pioneering an entirely new compelling platform that is playful, social, and fun to use.”
-Morgan Page, Two time Grammy-Nominated Electronic Artist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 970 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your system needs to be capable of running VR applications.
